intro: Boxerpunk Stories is a Story based 2D Pixel Art Game.
description:
Complete the story by defeating your opponents by following the story!

Our character is a boxer, he falls to the hospital as a result of a heavy blow in the match, but this is not even an obstacle for him!
As soon as our character is healed, he returns to the fields to beat his opponents on the fields like in the old days!

Follow Quests, Talk to People, Get Hints and follow the story!
Fight your opponents and earn money.
Get some rest at home, improve yourself in the gym and increase your strength!
